question:
The e-cop app was recently launched by one of the states’ police. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. E-cop app is intended for safety of women.
  2. It was launched by Madhya Pradesh.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The e-cop app was launched for providing safety for the women of the state. It has an SOS feature which when used will send an alert message (SMS) to 100 and 5 other contact numbers fed into the app. Statement 2 is correct:       The e-cop app was launched by the Madhya Pradesh state police force. The MP e-cop app also has facilities for reporting cases of missing persons, vehicles, documents, mobile phones etc. The app will also enable the sharing of anonymous information.
